data.title: polkat: Semi-automate full polarization of MeerKAT observations
data.name: polkat
data.description: Repository of tools and scripts for short track (full polarisation) calibration and imaging with MeerKAT (and possibly other linear-feed interferometers). Devloped as a part of the X-KAT collaboration.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "**IMPORTANT: For time series or multi-epoch campaigns**, it is strongly recommended that you download a local branch and use it consistently throughout your project. This repository is actively mainta"
"This repository contains a modified version of the MeerKAT semi-automated data processing routine oxkat, enhanced to support full polarization calibration and Stokes I, Q, U, V imaging."

"This routine is designed primarily for use on the ILIFU clusters... The necessary software is bundled into containers using apptainer... Containers are available in `/software/containers` on ILIFU... If you do not have ILIFU access but want to use polkat, you can get container access via pulling from dockerhub"
